text: Question 29 Consider three registers R1, R2, and R3 that store numbers in IEEE-754 single precision floating point format. Assume that R1 and R2 contain the values (in hexadecimal notation) 0x42200000 and 0xC1200000, respectively. IfR3 = %, what is the value stored in R3? e 0x40800000 @ 0xC0800000 G 0x83400000 @ 0xC8500000 Digital Logic Number System
